doc.field: Records of the Jamaica Peace Corps Training Program
Records of the Jamaica Peace Corps Training Program
Series III. Volunteer Registration Records [Some material restricted]
Series III. Volunteer Registration Records [Some material restricted]

.5 linear feet (1 box), arranged chronologically. This series documents the registration process and includes correspondence, questionnaires, volunteer lists, Peace Corps brochures, instructions, forms, and print material from International House where volunteers resided during their training. Because of the sensitive nature of material that appears on the registration forms, folders 13 and 14 are restricted.
